title: Newly Renovated Apartment in Lincolnwood, Top Floor
map_address: 6757 Avers Ave near W Pratt Ave
posting_body: Beautifully renovated 3 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom apartment in Lincolnwood, Illinois.
This a convenient location, as it is a short walk to Todd Hall School (K-2), Rutledge Hall School (3-5), and Lincoln Hall Middle School (6-8).
Apartment for lease is located on the top floor of a 2 apartment building.
The Newley renovated kitchen is equipped with new stainless steel appliances, new kitchen cabinets, and a granite countertop.
The building has a fenced backyard and a detached garage.
Please call or email with any questions or inquiries.
